name: Isaiah 58:10 Ministries & Outreach
description: Isaiah 58:10 Ministries & Outreach is a nonprofit organization dedicated to feeding the homeless in Laurel County and surrounding areas. The ministry provides sack lunches to the homeless through their Project PB&J program, serving London, Corbin, Manchester, Barbourville, East Bernstadt, Gray, Keavy, Woodbine, Williamsburg, Flat Lick, Middlesboro, and Lily areas. They also operate a soup kitchen in partnership with The Good Samaritan House in London, KY, open Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday and Saturday from 11am-1pm. The organization offers resource lists for the homeless and food insecure, and maintains a greenhouse project to provide fresh vegetables to the community.
source: Verified from official website and Facebook page
hours_of_operation: Soup Kitchen: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM
eligibility_requirements: Open to homeless and food insecure individuals in the community
populations_served: Homeless individuals, food insecure families, low-income community members
cost_information: Free services - no cost to participants
notes: VERIFIED INFORMATION: All contact information verified on 2025-01-27. Address 2102 Marydell Rd, London, KY 40741 verified from TaxExemptWorld.org. Website http://is5810.com/ confirmed working and current. Services and programs verified from official website including Project PB&J sack lunch program and soup kitchen partnership with Good Samaritan House. Service areas confirmed as Whitley County, Knox County, Laurel County, and Clay County from Facebook page. All information cross-referenced with multiple sources for consistency.
